contents.text: In silico models that integrates nonlinear mechanics, molecular pathways, and cellular behavior to describe the inflammatory response and healing process of arterial tissues following collagen damage
Several chemo-mechano-biological mechanisms are modeled and combined to simulate the entire healing cascade
Complex loading scenarios and inhomogeneous damage distributions, highlighting its utility for in silico clinical trials and precision medicin
